properties.description: This policy enforces naming conventions for Azure Storage Accounts. Storage account names must follow organizational standards for consistency and identification. The default pattern expects lowercase alphanumeric names following the format: st{env}{app}{instance} (e.g., stdevweb001).
properties.displayName: Enforce Naming Convention for Storage Accounts

metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match
Regular expression pattern that storage account names must match. Default: st{env}{app}{instance} (e.g., stdevweb001, stproddata002)
